item.title: AtCoder Beginner Contest 095 Review
item.description: #Time required #Impression I was regrettable that I couldn’t solve problem D before, but I was relieved because I could solve it this time. I think that more speed will be required in the future, so I will try to acquire the typical ideas firmly. #A problem The number of toppings corresponds to the number of â—‹, so you can count and output. s=input() print(700+s.count("o")*100) #B Problem It is problem B, but it requires a little attention.
